content: the simple spiral looks fab sitting on my desk - an eye-grabbing design that is easy to make because you join at the end of each round making it much easier to keep track of where you are pattern uses only single_crochet uk double_crochet and chains my smaller spiral is 12 rounds of the pattern worked in patons 100% cotton 4ply with a 3 00 mm hook measurement 4¾ /12 cm across the larger spiral is 20 rounds worked in puppets eldorado size 10 cotton thread and a 1 75 mm hook measures just over 5½ /14 cm across
